about_the_game:
Blade Ball Arena is a high-octane, heat-seeking dodge brawler! Master the art of blade ball and crush your opponents in fast-paced PVP matches.

Discover your unique play style: Will you engage in psychological warfare, outsmarting your opponents with clever feints and unpredictable moves? Or will you rely on lightning-fast reflexes, aiming to outpace and overwhelm them with sheer speed? The choice is yours — master your approach, and climb to the top!

Earn new abilities through participating in matches to create your perfect load out that fits your play style, whether if it's aggressive or defensive.

Join Blade Ball Arena Now!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4 hardware CPU Threads Intel® Core™ i5 750 or higher
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 470, or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Blade Ball Arena is a fast-paced, easy-to-pick-up PVP game for you and your friends. No tricky rules. No tutorial. Just you, a blade, and a heat-seeking dodgeball. Got what it takes to come out on top in the Blade Ball Arena? Jump in for a game or two!
